channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache IoTDB
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache IoTDB

item.title: CVE-2022-38370|2024-08-03T10:54:03.893Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20iotdb
item.description: Apache IoTDB grafana-connector version 0.13.0 contains an interface without authorization, which may expose the internal structure of database. Users should upgrade to version 0.13.1 which addresses this issue.

item.title: CVE-2022-38369|2024-08-03T10:54:03.709Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20iotdb
item.description: Apache IoTDB version 0.13.0 is vulnerable by session id attack. Users should upgrade to version 0.13.1 which addresses this issue.

item.title: CVE-2022-43766|2024-08-03T13:40:06.448Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20iotdb
item.description: Apache IoTDB version 0.12.2 to 0.12.6, 0.13.0 to 0.13.2 are vulnerable to a Denial of Service attack when accepting untrusted patterns for REGEXP queries with Java 8. Users should upgrade to 0.13.3 which addresses this issue or use a later version of Java to avoid it.
